Reviews.Content: traveled varying locations europe poorest accommodation money paid double bed double duvet mismatched singles light bed bare wires shower basin disgusting washed sink shower moved onto destination trip celebrate husbands birthday lucky booked stay hotel extremely noisy road husband sleep due sirens hours night expected travelling amsterdam trip amsterdam returning stay free price forty pounds night 95 euros charged

Reviews.Content: alot ok run breakfast poor mouldy peice bread service average location takes atleast 15 minutes via tram centre amsterdam price paid didnt grade

Reviews.Title: “A horrible venue”

Reviews.Content: shabby torn curtains broken furniture mirror broken shower toilet real disgrace fixed hotel simply 3 star buy drinks bar consume ground floor overlooking busy junction busier reception receptionist enjoy chatting night shabby shabby shabby youve warned

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting”

Reviews.Content: 2 friends meant staying 4 night break informed near center 3 3 reception tiny filthy wouldnt wash dog bath hole wall triple 3 single beds close step tiny single corner else reception complain lady short rude giving key door worse previous bed broken lights hanging wall checked straight paid stay else fighting money look hotel outside looks 1st floor upwards hostel sheets windows people stuff balcony wind chimes etc plus 2 doors front hotel goes reception didnt enter presume goes accomodation upstairs dining filthy flies suggest book stay

Reviews.Content: time woman reception worst althought empty roomswe changed 4 roomsit servicethe smell bad breakfastthe bathroom useless dirtyi couldnt hotelthe receptionists animals waiting getting regret staying bugs wouldnt rate hotel terrible

Reviews.Title: “DISGUSTING, UNCLEAN, UNSAFE - DO NOT STAY HERE OR THE OMEGA”

Reviews.Content: surprise arrived booked omega hotel unfriendly hotel clerk informed double booked hotel city processed visa money unmarked taxi drove destination arrived hotel located highway neighborhood neither safe check rude staff discovered following sheets pillow filthy pillow particular piece snot blood lock inside door door shut sleep chair propped telephone functioning calling emergency smoke alarms night twice realized guests smoking cigarettes drugs smoking hotel sleeping double bed bedding single bed warm night wake call receive nearly missed train paris mother expressed serious concerns safety cleanliness hotel owner omega treated disrespect

Reviews.Title: “Does the job, but expect no service with a smile.”
Reviews.Author: m4rkym4rk
Reviews.Content: enjoyed staying city centre tram easy makes staying city centre joy staff miserable didnt smile goodbye polite engaging customer service costs ive stayed hotel staff cold paid 3 nights accomodation return flight included single aint bad id recommend wouldnt stay special awful

Reviews.Title: “It was ok, but wouldn't do it again”
Reviews.Author: Elsoueidi
Reviews.Content: hotel located tram station excellent cant miss bathroom clean beds comfortable sheets werent fitted night covering mattress staff helpful bit bold breakfast tasty limited home breakfast hotel breakfast toast boiled eggs honey jam butter ham cheese turkey breast slices hotel restaurants pub corner menu pizza 5 mins definately stay days wouldnt hotel

Reviews.Title: “A cheap hotel ... in every way!”

Reviews.Content: stayed friends hotel cheap according advertisement 10min central station entered hotel leave luggage 2m 2m luggage space ours found ventilation lift remote control telephone wardrobe person 4 lights furniture missing gran finale breakfast 7am else wont left wont replace bread etc live necessities

Reviews.Content: shamelessly awful hotel cant add comments except repeat recommendation avoid costs btw doesnt tripadvisor aggregate ratings tell straight avoided wade pages average head

Reviews.Title: “This is not a three start hotel.”

Reviews.Content: husband booked hotel teenagers stranded amsterdam volcanic ash airport closure read reviews written scrap paper taped door beds ikea style bunk bed thin mattresses smelled damp food windows near ceiling appeared filthy covered paper rubbish floating toilet nasty feel safe receptionist offered bailed booked hotel recommend hotel
